amendment.description: Amendment requires Presidential monument designations provided for under the Antiquities Act to be approved by the state legislatures and governors where the proposed monument is located.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-444 to require Presidential monument designations provided for under the Antiquities Act to be approved by the state legislatures and governors where the proposed monument is located.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 198 (Roll no. 162).
